invocations.description: Returns true if nothing is obstructing the throw/shoot path between the tile at fromx and fromy and the tile at location x:posx, y:posy, z:posz, false otherwise; fromx and fromy default to your current location.
invocations.ex:
if tileshootable($attacked.posx, $attacked.posy, $attacked.posz) then
	useoncreature('sudden death rune', $attacked)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will shoot a 'sudden death rune' on the current attacked creature if there's nothing obstructing the path.
